text: Maka kokankokama ama mopafima mani'naza vahe'mo'za magopi eme eri atru nehaze. Hagi ana vahe amu'nompintira iza otino ama ana zankura huamara nehuno, ko'ma evu'nea zantamina taveri hugahie. Keagare'ma oti knazupa zamasaminke'za tamage nehaze hu'zama keagafima zamazama hanaza vahera zamavare'ne'za eho. Anama hanage'za mago'a vahe'mo'za nentahi'za e'i tamage nehaze hu'za hugahaze.
